html:
Introduction to Graphics Programming

This module will introduce you to the fundamentals of computer graphics in games and graphical programming techniques applied to games.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate knowledge of game and graphical concepts, along with the industry context in which games are developed.

+  Use API documentation to research the correct solution pathways for any given technical problem.

+  Implement algorithms, data structures and file-handling using a high-level programming language and API to support games and graphics development.

+  Use problem solving skills to design and develop graphical environments for games.

Module Content:
